name: Pit Crews
Lore: 'Pit droids are used by Podracer pilots to assist in the maintenance of their racer. While a high standard is usually maintained, sometimes things can get out of hand.',
Text: 'Use 3 Force to reveal opponent''s hand. All cards opponent has 3 or more of in hand are lost. OR Use 1 Force to ''repair'' your Podracer. OR Target a Podracer. Draw destiny. If destiny > Podracer''s destiny number, target Podracer is ''damaged.''',
